## isNull() function

Determines whether an input is null or not.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isNull(value: unknown): value is null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | unknown | input |

<b>Returns:</b>

value is null

true if the input is null, false otherwise.

## Example


```ts
isNull(null)      // true
isNull(undefined) // false
isNull({})        // false
```
